black.$description: color.base.black — Pure black. Use for: dark theme text emphasis, high-contrast borders. Contrast ratio with white: 21:1 (WCAG AAA). Rarely used directly - prefer dark.9 for softer blacks or semantic color.text token.

0.$description: color.base.blue.0 — Lightest blue - primary light backgrounds, selected row highlights

1.$description: color.base.blue.1 — Light blue - hover backgrounds, info alert backgrounds

2.$description: color.base.blue.2 — Mid-light blue - progress bars, decorative

3.$description: color.base.blue.3 — Medium blue - icons on light backgrounds

4.$description: color.base.blue.4 — Mid blue - primary buttons on dark theme, links on dark

5.$description: color.base.blue.5 — Base blue - primary buttons, links (light theme)

6.$description: color.base.blue.6 — Dark blue - primary brand color, main CTAs, navigation active states

7.$description: color.base.blue.7 — Darker blue - pressed states, text on light blue backgrounds

8.$description: color.base.blue.8 — Very dark blue - high contrast text

9.$description: color.base.blue.9 — Darkest blue - maximum emphasis, dark accents

1.$description: color.base.cyan.1 — Light cyan - hover states

8.$description: color.base.cyan.8 — Very dark cyan - text

9.$description: color.base.cyan.9 — Darkest cyan - maximum emphasis

0.$description: color.base.dark.0 — Lightest dark - text color on dark backgrounds, disabled states on dark theme

4.$description: color.base.dark.4 — Mid dark - borders on dark theme, dividers

5.$description: color.base.dark.5 — Base dark - elevated surfaces on dark theme, cards

6.$description: color.base.dark.6 — Dark base - primary dark theme background, app shells

7.$description: color.base.dark.7 — Darker - alternative dark background, sidebar backgrounds

8.$description: color.base.dark.8 — Very dark - modal overlays on dark theme, deep shadows

9.$description: color.base.dark.9 — Darkest - near-black for maximum contrast elements

white.$description: color.base.white — Pure white. Use for: light theme backgrounds, text on dark backgrounds, card surfaces. Contrast ratio with black: 21:1 (WCAG AAA). Avoid using directly - prefer semantic tokens like color.body or color.default.
